info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Franklin County through 500 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Christopher, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Benton, Rend Lake Area and West City around 430 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 64 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
